abstract: A new study estimates that the number of high-net-worth individuals in China —  mostly first-generation entrepreneurs who have more than $1.5 million — will grow to 585,000 this year.
snippet: A new study estimates that the number of high-net-worth individuals in China —  mostly first-generation entrepreneurs who have more than $1.5 million — will grow to 585,000 this year.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — China’s economic boom has made many Chinese very wealthy indeed. A new study by the consulting firm Bain & Company shows just how many — and how rapidly — the ranks of the rich are swelling in this country of 1.3 billion.

headline.main: Ranks of the Rich Growing in China
